name: HWY3310
description:
How far can you get on Highway 3310?

Control with left and right arrow keys. Start and restart the game using either key.

You may need to focus the game by clicking on it.

Made for the Nokia 3310 Jam. Featuring faithful 84x48 resolution, 2 colours and sampled monophonic sound.

Banging monophonic soundtrack by Adam Rustidge.
